articles.title: Uruguay President Orsi deepens ties with China’s Xi despite Trump threats - Al Jazeera
articles.description: Yamandu Orsi is the first Latin American leader to visit China since the US abducted Venezuela’s Nicolas Maduro.
articles.content:
China and Uruguay have moved to deepen their strategic partnership despite pressure from United States President Donald Trump to keep Chinese influence out of Latin America.
